description.en: Fires after some text has been selected in an element.
description.jp: Fires after some text has been selected in an element.

description.en: Fires on a mouse click on the element.
description.jp: Fires on a mouse click on the element.

description.en: Fires on a mouse double-click on the element.
description.jp: Fires on a mouse double-click on the element.

description.en: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.
description.jp: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.

description.en: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.
description.jp: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

description.en: Specifies the language of the element's content.
description.jp: Specifies the language of the element's content.

description.en: Specifies whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not.
description.jp: Specifies whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not.

description.en: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.
description.jp: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

description.en: Specifies extra information about an element.
description.jp: Specifies extra information about an element.

description.en: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not.
description.jp: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not.
